name: Space Jump (Saucy Panda)
description:
Your spaceship's security system has gone rouge and is now targeting you. Reach the exit to survive.

Space jump is my first complete game and my first jam game, I had only roughly one day to work on it so it is missing many features that I wanted to include. Complete the levels by using your gravity boots to attach to various walls.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys to dash

R to restart

Esc to exit
